title: Portal description
description: Everyone now feels the richness of Belarusian poetry. But this wealth did not come immediately - it did not accumulate over the years, not even decades, but over the centuries. Like no other, Belarusian literature, Belarusian poetry is associated with the people. And it finds explanation. The Belarusian people were monstrously oppressed by tsarism. Tsarism did not even recognize the Belarusian language. He considered that language is a dialect. But the people created beautiful things in their language: songs, tales that were passed down from generation to generation. With the help of our website, you can learn more about the people who created these works.
